objects.name: Coins
objects.description: In-game currency displayed as a natural number, showing current amount owned and received.
objects.special_rules: Diminishing returns mechanism: received coins decrease as owned coins increase until reaching zero.
objects.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/49725d4126fb6df840b248096efd13caf7bd5cd2eb4282ce8380096ac6222240.jpg

objects.name: Exp (Trophy Road)
objects.description: Experience points displayed as a natural number, showing current amount owned and received.
objects.special_rules: Diminishing returns mechanism: received exp decreases as owned exp increases until reaching zero.
objects.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/49725d4126fb6df840b248096efd13caf7bd5cd2eb4282ce8380096ac6222240.jpg

objects.name: ELO
objects.description: Ranking points displayed as a natural number, showing current amount owned and changes in it.
objects.special_rules: Diminishing returns mechanism: received ELO decreases as owned ELO increases until reaching zero.
objects.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/744daa8c2b8f93cf843e278a90a534819c19545a48d837c0d71ac76578a52673.jpg

objects.name: Team ID
objects.description: Identifier for team affiliation, using constants (0 for Team 1, 1 for Team 2).
objects.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/47f43de1714668ff7a8589b78d85e0a182ae38fb63bb3def504644de09289252.jpg

objects.name: Player ID
objects.description: Unique identifier for players, represented as a natural number. Multiple IDs indicate party membership.
objects.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/47f43de1714668ff7a8589b78d85e0a182ae38fb63bb3def504644de09289252.jpg

objects.name: Player Name
objects.description: String used to differentiate players in the interface.
objects.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/47f43de1714668ff7a8589b78d85e0a182ae38fb63bb3def504644de09289252.jpg

objects.name: Tank ID(Class)
objects.description: Identifier for tank types (Scout: 0, Assault: 1, Heavy: 2) used by players.
objects.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/47f43de1714668ff7a8589b78d85e0a182ae38fb63bb3def504644de09289252.jpg

objects.name: Tank Skin ID
objects.description: List of natural numbers used to display tank skins.

objects.name: Match Type
objects.special_rules: Rank W/L statistic only relevant in ranked matches.

systems.name: Post-Match Profile System
systems.description: System designed to display user-related metrics after matches.
systems.mechanics: Tracks and displays parameters such as Coins, Exp, ELO, Team ID, Player ID, Player Name, Tank ID(Class), Tank Skin ID, and Match Type.
systems.objectives: Provide clear and consistent post-match information across different game modes.
interactions: Differentiate between ranked and casual matches
systems.source_note: Document titled '[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile'

logic_rules.description: As the owned amount of coins increases, the received amount decreases until it reaches zero.
logic_rules.source_note: Table from Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/multiplayer_module_tank_war_post-match_profile/[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile/auto/images/49725d4126fb6df840b248096efd13caf7bd5cd2eb4282ce8380096ac6222240.jpg

logic_rules.description: As the owned amount of exp increases, the received amount decreases until it reaches zero.

logic_rules.description: As the owned amount of ELO increases, the received amount decreases until it reaches zero.

logic_rules.effect: Enable tracking of Rank W/L statistic

requirements.title: Consistent Parameter Display
requirements.description: Ensure all parameters have clear and consistent formats across different game modes.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: All parameters are displayed with standardized formats and descriptions.
requirements.source_note: Document titled '[Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Post-Match Profile'

requirements.title: Clear Ranking Criteria
requirements.description: Define and display clear criteria for ranking users based on performance metrics.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Ranking criteria are clearly defined and consistently applied across all matches.
